about_the_game:
Every "Hero's journey" starts with a call to adventure, a quest that is given to a hero. Our hero, despite the fact that he doesn't want to be a "Hero", is forced to start this journey by receiving a quest from the King - to save the Princess, who was kidnapped by a mighty and Terrifying Dragon. But, as it turns out, the Dragon is not as "Terrifying" as everyone described her; instead, she is actually just a beautiful girl who saved the Princess from a magical curse.

Our hero decides to stay a little longer with the her, and slowly their affection towards each other grows..

My Furry Dragon is a short novel about love, self-discovery, family, and having fun with a dragon!

Features:

• Fascinating story with romance and comedy elements.
• HD fully original artworks.
• 2 hours of content.
• Relaxing atmosphere.
• Hot dragon!

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
